entry.en: Thank you for playing the demo.
entry.zh: 试玩版体验结束，感谢您的游玩！

entry.en: They see your peace, woven of faith and toil,
entry.zh: 赞美你以信仰与劳役编织的片刻安宁，

entry.en:
This game saves data automatically at certain points.
Please do not turn off the software while this symbol is displayed.
entry.zh:
本游戏在某些情况下会自动存档。
如果屏幕上出现此标志，请不要强行关闭游戏。

entry.en: use of a controller is highly recommended
entry.zh: 强烈建议使用游戏手柄

entry.en: - From ‘Pharloom’s Folly’ by the Conductor Romino
entry.zh: ——摘自《纺络谬世录》 指挥家罗米诺 著

entry.en: They forget your heart, bound in slumber and servitude,
entry.zh: 谁又记得你沉睡于桎梏中的野兽之心？

entry.en: They see your beauty, so frail and fine,
entry.zh: 虫豸皆敬仰你纤弱的神迹之美，

entry.en: When you wake they shall see your truth,
entry.zh: 待你醒来，挣裂千丝缠茧——

entry.en: A beast’s nature bare to all.
